By using Amazon recycled content paint, you are helping to protect the environment. By replacing new paint with recycled paint you are saving all of the resources that would have been used in making the new paint. The energy used to make and transport the paint, as well as all of the minerals, chemicals and pigments that are needed to make new paint are saved when recycled paint replaces virgin paint.
